translations.Add your profile information! For exampl: Add your profile information! For example your email is needed to reset your password.
translations.Add your profile information! Set a prof: Add your profile information! Set a profile picture and full name for easier recognition across all features.
translations.Add your profile information! Set a full: Add your profile information! Set a full name for easier recognition across all features.
translations.Add your profile information! Set a prof: Add your profile information! Set a profile picture for easier recognition across all features.
translations.Get the apps to sync your files: Get the apps to sync your files
translations.%s gives you access to your files wherev: %s gives you access to your files wherever you are. Our easy to use desktop and mobile clients are available for all major platforms at zero cost.
translations.Setup sync clients using an <a href=\"\": Setup sync clients using an app password. That way you can make sure you are able to revoke access in case you lose that device.
translations.Besides the sync clients you can connect: Besides the sync clients you can connect any other software that supports the WebDAV/CalDAV/CardDAV protocols to %s.
translations.The first run wizard helps you to get st: The first run wizard helps you to get started with %s.
translations.Access & share your files, calendars, co: Access & share your files, calendars, contacts, mail & more from any device, on your terms
translations.There’s more information in the <a targe: There’s more information in the documentation and on our website.
translations.If you like Nextcloud, <a href=\"mailto:: If you like Nextcloud, recommend it to your friends and contribute back!
translations.If you want to support the project {cont: If you want to support the project {contributeopen}join development{linkclose} or {contributeopen}spread the word{linkclose}!
